title: ESA expectations
content: Its a bit difficult stilll to understand how ESA marks are given. How should the descriptive answers be written. Does it need to be verbatim as its given as class notes or something else. Is it checked by the same teacher who teaches you. is there a guideline on how the answers will be rated or need to be written?

comments.body: Pretty sure we had like 1 previous year paper that had a correction method present in it. You should get a decent idea from it.
I have absolutely missed this. Any ideas how can I get this?
Yo at what time did you have your isa 1 last year
Its in the isa esa WhatsApp group but it was only for phy
So for first sem we had like 2 months of time before our first isa
Can you share the whatsapp link I just need to get some basic idea :(
too bad :(  can you share a screenshot for the same ? thanks in advance
